definition: (of people who were estranged) to be reconciled/(of a couple) to get back together
to go and return/to return/to resume/to return to a normal or original state/to repeat/again/to recover/to restore/to turn over/to reply/to answer/to reply to a letter/to retaliate/to carry out
variant of 復|复[fu4]/to reply to a letter
100 ml/one-tenth of a peck/measure for dry grain equal to one-tenth of sheng 升 or liter, or one-hundredth dou 斗
to close/to join/to fit/to be equal to/whole/together/round (in battle)/conjunction (astronomy)/1st note of pentatonic scale/old variant of 盒[he2]
diphthong (such as putonghua ɑi, ei etc)

pinyin: Gao1 er3 ji1 fu4 he2 ti3

sentences.english: A compound slide with tool post sits between them.
sentences.chinese: 复合投影片与工具后坐在他们之间。

sentences.english: The Compound regular Team Round will not use the set system either.
sentences.chinese: 复合弓的团体比赛也不再将采用局胜制。

sentences.english: The pressure sensitive behaviors of carbon fiber-reinforced cement-matrix composites with different moisture contents were studied.
sentences.chinese: 对碳纤维水泥基复合材料的压敏特性进行了实验研究。

sentences.english: The foam concrete block was prepared by self-made compound protein foam agent.
sentences.chinese: 以自制复合型蛋白质为发泡剂，制备泡沫混凝土砌块。

sentences.english: The more LRP5, the more the enzyme is blocked, and the less serotonin is made.
sentences.chinese: LRP5越多，越多的酶被阻滞，复合胺产生越少。

sentences.english: The brine is of the composite formation mechanism of sedimentary transformation and the dissolution and filtration of solid potassium salts.
sentences.chinese: 卤水为沉积变质水和固态钾盐溶滤水的复合成因。

sentences.english: The lack of exotic states tells against a picture of resonances as being composite.
sentences.chinese: 缺乏例外态也不支持共振态是复合的图象。

sentences.english: XRD indicates that CB and barium titanate were existed in the compound particle.
sentences.chinese: XRD分析可知复合粒子中含有钛酸钡晶体和炭黑。

sentences.english: Our company specializes in producing all kinds of complex color printing packaging products.
sentences.chinese: 我公司专业生产各种复合彩印包装制品。

sentences.english: Composite connections are only low-resolution, and are not ideal for HDTVs.
sentences.chinese: 复合视频接口仅是低分辨率的，不适合高清电视。

sentences.english: This paper is concerned with the behavior of a screw dislocation in a half-plane piezoelectric composite medium.
sentences.chinese: 研究了半平面压电复合介质中螺位错的性能。

sentences.english: The invention discloses a magnesite hot pressing composite board, belonging to the field of novel board materials.
sentences.chinese: 本发明公开了一种菱镁热压复合板，属新型板材领域。
它是一个陆海复合国家。

sentences.english: A complex water-repellent gypsum additive was studied in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 采用特殊工艺制备了复合型石膏防水剂。

sentences.english: The powder and the composite emulsion were characterized by FTIR.
sentences.chinese: 用FTIR对粉体和苯丙复合乳液进行了表征。

sentences.english: Cu-W composite and its use in metal hot working;
sentences.chinese: 研究了不同球磨时间对钨铜复合材料性能的影响。

definition: to part company/to split up/to break up
to become reconciled/on good terms with each other
lit. lotus roots may break, but the fiber remains joined (idiom); lovers part, but still long for one another
a shattered mirror put back together (idiom)/(of marriage) to pick up the pieces and start anew/for a separated couple to reconcile and reunite
derailment (railway accident)/to leave the rails/fig. to overstep bounds/fig. to have an extramarital affair
to seek happiness elsewhere (euphemism for extramarital sex)/a bit on the side
to obtain a certificate or license etc/(PRC) to obtain a marriage license/to marry
